Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 建立使用者介面項目，這個使用者介面項目可讓使用者叫用 ASP.NET 事件處理常式，並且提供方法將使用者輸入從 UI 項目張貼回伺服器。

span.span: Creates a user interface element that enables users to invoke ASP.NET event handlers and it provides a means to post user input from UI elements back to the server.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項顯示成要求的裝置上的互動式 UI 項目。The control displays as an interactive UI element on the requesting device. UI 項目標籤取自屬性，都繼承自基底類別。The label of the UI element comes from the property, which is inherited from the base class. > [!CAUTION] > 避免在 ASP.NET mobile Web 網頁 Url 中使用特殊字元。Avoid using special characters in ASP.NET mobile Web page URLs. 針對張貼產生 HREF 標記`Command`回傳至伺服器的事件不會嚴格驗證。The HREF tags generated for posting `Command` events back to the server are not strictly validated. 例如，包含空格的 URL 會導致 WML 無法處理某些 WML 瀏覽器所產生。For example, a URL that includes spaces results in the generation of WML that cannot be handled by some WML browsers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何附加命令事件。The following code example demonstrates how to attach command events. 按一下任一按鈕引發事件。Clicking either of the buttons raises the event. 使用者定義函式會使用`CommandEventArgs`引數，以查看哪些button 已按下。The user-defined function uses the `CommandEventArgs` argument to see which button was clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/VB/default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了執行表單驗證，必須提交表單與控制項所引發的驗證，而且必須具有其屬性設定為`true`。For validation to occur on a form, the form must be submitted with a control that raises validation, and must have its property set to `true`. 控制項是目前唯一引發驗證。The control is currently the only control that raises validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當啟動控制項，它會引發事件。When a control is activated, it raises the event. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 裝置特定呈現 」 和 「 裝置的特定行為 」 章節。For more information, see the "Device-Specific Rendering" and "Device-Specific Behavior" sections in . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何附加命令事件。The following code example demonstrates how to attach command events. 按一下任一按鈕引發事件。Clicking either of the buttons raises the event. 使用者定義函式會使用`CommandEventArgs`引數，以查看哪些button 已按下。The user-defined function uses the `CommandEventArgs` argument to see which button was clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/VB/default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取透過兩個可用的類型列舉型別。Access the two available types through the enumeration. (預設值) (default) 這個命令會呈現為按鈕。The command is rendered as a button. 這個命令會呈現為連結。The command is rendered as a link. > [!NOTE] > 屬性支援值只支援 JavaScript，所指定的裝置上屬性。The property supports the value only on devices that support JavaScript as indicated by the property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用呈現命令連結或按鈕的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to the use the property to render the command as a link or a button. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). span.span: if the control submits the form; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行動控制項，例如，可以覆寫這個方法來判斷是否這是用來以送出表單的控制項。Mobile controls, such as the , can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission. 其他控制項可以透過提供以程式設計方式判斷必須是 submit 控制項，例如，藉由檢查特定屬性的邏輯擴充。Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be submit controls, for example, by checking for specific properties. > [!NOTE] > Form-submit 控制項，它會實作時，才會被視為控制項方法來擷取回傳事件。A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements method to capture the postback event. 否則，它不會註冊預設事件處理常式，即使該方法會傳回`true`。Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ItemCommand As CommandEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者選取與 項目關聯的命令時。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當定義事件處理常式，項目產生一個事件會透過使用者互動時，控制項告知處理常式。When an event handler is defined, the control notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction. 不同於事件，事件會反昇至父控制項。Unlike the event, the event is bubbled up to the parent controls. 事件轉譯為特定裝置和 「 裝置的特定行為 」 一節中詳細討論。The event rendering is device-specific and is discussed in detail in the "Device-Specific Behavior" section of . 之後引發事件事件。The event is raised after an event. 在此案例中，您重複相同的動作集每次按下命令按鈕，您可以使用或屬性按一下的控制項，來識別哪些命令按鈕的使用者。In a scenario where you repeat the same set of actions each time a command button is clicked, you can use either the or property of the control to identify which command button the user clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用頁面上的多個命令的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event for multiple commands on a page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發變更事件的衍生類別中覆寫方法控制當回傳至伺服器。The method can be overridden in a derived class to raise change events for the control when it posts back to the server. 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SoftkeyLabel { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定或傳回顯示螢幕鍵盤時所用的標籤。

span.span: Sets or returns the label used when a softkey is displayed.

summary.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 顯示螢幕鍵盤時所用的標籤。

span.span: The label used when a soft key is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只適用於支援螢幕鍵盤的裝置。This property is used only for devices that support softkeys. 如果這個屬性是空的使用控制項的屬性。If this property is empty, the property of the control is used. 如果屬性是空的或它的長度小於 9屬性適用於螢幕鍵盤標籤。If the property is empty or its length is less than 9, the property is used for the softkey label. 否則，這個字`Go`（如果它是送出控制命令） 會顯示。Otherwise, the word `Go` (if it is a submit control command) is displayed. 值屬性會被截斷成 12 個字元 （標準最大長度是螢幕鍵盤的）。The value of the property is truncated to 12 characters (the standard maximum length of a softkey).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會在內部使用控制按一下引發時事件。The method is used internally by the control when it is clicked to raise a event.
